meta.title: MARC authority

export.failure: Unable to complete request, please try again.
authority-record.delete.success: MARC authority record {headingRef} has been deleted
authority-record.delete.error: Unable to delete MARC authority record {headingRef} . Please try again.

delete.label: Confirm deletion of authority record
delete.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the authority record: {headingRef} ?
delete.linkedRecord.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the authority record: {headingRef} ? If you proceed with deletion, then {count, number} linked bibliographic {count, plural, one {record} other {records}} will retain authorized value and will become uncontrolled.
reports.HEADINGS_UPDATES.success: Authority headings updates report (Job ID {name}) is being generated. Go to the Export manager app to download report. It may take a few minutes for the report to complete.
reports.FAILED_UPDATES.success: Failed linked bibliographic fields updates report (Job ID {name}) is being generated. Go to the Export manager app to download report. It may take a few minutes for the report to complete.
reports.fail: We were unable to create this report. Please try again.
reports.HEADINGS_UPDATES.description: List of updated MARC authority (1XX) headings
reports.FAILED_UPDATES.description: List of controlled bibliographic fields failed to update

reportModal.endDate.error.greaterThan: "End date" must be greater than or equal to "Start date"

settings.html.page.title: MARC authority settings
settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.colu: Select a file as "Active" if users should be able to create a new authority record for the file
settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.erro: Error saving data. Name is required.
Error saving data. HRID cannot start with zero.
Error saving data. HRID starts with is required.
Error saving data. Only one prefix is allowed for local authority files.
Error saving data. Prefix must be unique.
Error saving data. Prefix is required.
Error saving data. Prefix cannot be more than {maxlength} characters.
settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.crea: The authority file {name} has been successfully created.
settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.upda: The authority file {name} has been successfully updated.
Changes to {name} cannot be saved. Existing authority records are already assigned to this authority file.
Changes to {name} cannot be saved because it is not the most recent version.
settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.dele: {name} cannot be deleted. Existing authority records are already assigned to this authority file.
settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.conf: Are you sure you want to delete this authority file? After deletion, new records will no longer be able to be assigned to this authority file.
